name: The Grunk
description: The Grunk is a perfect representation of its parent strains Grape Ape and Skunk #1. The aroma is sweet and fruity, mixing with pungent skunky notes to create a flavorful burst of earthy, grape flavors upon exhale. The relaxing indica-dominant effects calm body pains and are balanced by a clear-headed cerebral buzz that lifts away anxieties.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Tingly, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Depression, Headaches, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Anxious, Dizzy
